title: [Epidemiology] An investment of 9.6 billion USD would adequately protect healthcare workers in all low- and middle-income countries during the pandemic. This intervention would save 2,299,543 lives, costing $59 USD per HCW case averted and $4,309 USD per HCW life saved. The societal ROI would be 755.3 billion USD.
